name: Astro Blitz
description:
Astro Blitz is an endless space shooter in which you fight off waves of enemy ships whilst also using your shield to absorb their fire power and use it against them.

This full version of the game includes everything found in the demo as well as additional enemies and health power-ups. Additionally, by purchasing the full version you will receive future updates including content such as extra game modes, more enemies and a wider range of power-ups.
